name: Herakles and the Princess of Troy OST
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to the 2D platformer adventure game, Herakles and the Princess of Troy. It features over 18 minutes of epic music composed by Adam Mullen. Traditional instruments such as lyre, soulful strings, raging low brass, and thundering percussion will make you feel like the Greek hero himself as you take on the army of Troy, mythical creatures, and heed the call to adventure.
